description: This is a Java source file defining a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController. It provides several HTTP GET endpoints for basic application health, documentation redirection, and info messages, with Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for documentation purposes.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing endpoints for greeting, documentation, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, constructing the URL based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/health' and returns 'OK' indicating application health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/api/info' and returns application information string.
